title: Unbroken.2014.720p.BrRip.2CH.x265.HEVC-PSA
description:
How to play H.265/HEVC
If you want to play this smoothly, you need to use a device/PC with at least dual-core processor.You have to update your player to latest version. Also if you use your PC to watch it, use PotPlayer. However, MPC-HC (preferably in K-Lite Media Codec Pack) is the recommended. Only 4K TV's support this codec yet. To play on Android, use MX Player

========================
www.PSArips.com
========================
